translation.en: -[laughs] -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎（鸟镇公园）

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: Hey, ice cream!
translation.zh: ‎冰淇淋

translation.en: -Mine, mine, mine, mine, mine! -No!
translation.zh: ‎我的…嘿 ‎不要

translation.en: [laughs] Empathy is over!
translation.zh: ‎同理心时代结束

translation.en: Being a bully is cool again!
translation.zh: ‎欺负人又是潮流了

translation.en: Hey, I'm being bullied! Hey! [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎你欺负我

translation.en: -[Tuca] Whoop! -No! [groans]
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: Yes, it is I, Tuca!
translation.zh: ‎没错 我就是图卡

translation.en: Friend, hero, connoisseur of snacks!
translation.zh: ‎良友 英雄 小吃鉴赏家

translation.en: Confident yet relatable.
translation.zh: ‎自信又人见人爱

translation.en: Wearer of short shorts!
translation.zh: ‎爱穿短裤

translation.en: Stupid toucan!
translation.zh: ‎愚蠢的大嘴鸟

translation.en: That was my ice cream! [in deep voice] And you're gonna pay!
translation.zh: ‎那是我的冰淇淋 你会付出代价的

translation.en: Life lesson, kiddo!
translation.zh: ‎孩子 吃一堑长一智

translation.en: -Nothing belongs to anyone. -[bike bell rings]
translation.zh: ‎没有任何东西是属于任何人的

translation.en: Hey, that's my bike!
translation.zh: ‎那是我的单车

translation.en: -Tuca! -Bertie!
translation.zh: ‎图卡 ‎柏蒂

translation.en: I miss you! Ugh, I hate change!
translation.zh: ‎我想你 我讨厌改变

translation.en: The apartment is so quiet without you. And clean.
translation.zh: ‎你不在 公寓好安静好干净

translation.en: I know! I'm so nasty.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我太邋遢了

translation.en: I bring a lot of zest to my environment.
translation.zh: ‎我为我周边的环境带来独特个性

translation.en: So, when do you wanna come over to get your things?
translation.zh: ‎你什么时候过来拿你的东西？

translation.en: You're not officially moved out until you've taken out your last box of stuff.
translation.zh:
‎你不拿走最后一个箱子
‎就不能算正式搬走了

translation.en: Sure, sure, I'll come get it later.
translation.zh: ‎当然…我等下去拿

translation.en: I'm just picking out some decor for my new place.
translation.zh: ‎我在为我的新家选装饰品

translation.en: Tuca, are you getting junk off the street again?
translation.zh: ‎图卡 你又在街上捡垃圾吗？

translation.en: No, I'm purchasing consumer goods... with my job money.
translation.zh: ‎不 我在购买日常用品 用工资买

translation.en: You don't have a job.
translation.zh: ‎你根本没有工作

translation.en: Just because I don't have a boring office job like you
translation.zh: ‎我没有你那样无趣的办公室工作

translation.en: doesn't mean I'm not swimming in gigs.
translation.zh: ‎不代表人家没在职海中扑腾

translation.en: Mobile notary, fortune teller, unlicensed tour guide, dog walker,
translation.zh:
‎随叫随到的公证人 算命师
‎无证导游 遛狗师

translation.en: cashing checks from my rich auntie, mobile notary again,
translation.zh: ‎找有钱阿姨啃老 又做流动公证人

translation.en: and, uh, freelance junk collector.
translation.zh: ‎还有兼职捡垃圾

translation.en: Anyhoo, I'm swinging by our place... I mean, your place, later today.
translation.zh:
‎总之 我会去我们的家…
‎我是说你的家 今天晚一点去

translation.en: Wow, it'll be so weird to not be roommates anymore.
translation.zh: ‎不再做室友了感觉真奇怪

translation.en: Yeah. We've had such good times.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们曾经那么开心

translation.en: ♪ Just you and me You and me forever ♪
translation.zh: ‎（油漆） ‎（图卡与柏蒂）

translation.en: ♪ I want you to give me some more ♪
translation.zh: ‎（图卡与柏蒂）

translation.en: Oh, man, we've been through so much.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我们一起经历了那么多

translation.en: This is the end of an era, Tuca.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个时代的终结 图卡

translation.en: Yeah, it's no big deal. I'm sure we'll live together again at some point.
translation.zh: ‎没什么大不了的 ‎我相信以后我们会再次做室友

translation.en: Uh, I hope not.
translation.zh: ‎我希望不会

translation.en: I mean, I'm kinda hoping things work out with my boyfriend moving in. [chuckles] Ow!
translation.zh: ‎我希望男友搬进来后一切顺利

translation.en: ♪ Get 'em up, get 'em up Get 'em up now ♪
translation.zh: ‎（斯贝克 建筑师 男友） ‎（小腿易疼 爱穿舒适裤子）

translation.en: We'll see. Bye.
translation.zh: ‎走着瞧 再见！

translation.en: Is Tuca okay?
translation.zh: ‎图卡还好吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I can help move this box of hers over there if she needs--
translation.zh:
‎我可以帮她搬这个箱子
‎只要她有需要…

translation.en: Nah, she's fine. I bet she's happy to have a space to herself
translation.zh:
‎不 她没事
‎我相信她很开心有自己的地方

translation.en: with nobody cramping her style.
translation.zh: ‎没人限制她我行我素

translation.en: Well, now that the two of us live alone,
translation.zh: ‎现在只有我们了

translation.en: I can finally cut loose and walk around here with my butt out!
translation.zh: ‎我终于可以放轻松 光屁股到处走了

translation.en: -Boom! Boom! Boom! -No!
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: Why does everyone I live with love free-buttin' it so much?
translation.zh:
‎为什么和我住在一起的人
‎都这么喜欢光屁股？

translation.en: [chuckles] I knew Tuca and I had a common bond.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道图卡和我有共同点

translation.en: Hey, what do you think if I hang this picture up here?
translation.zh: ‎我把这张照片挂起来如何？

translation.en: Oh. It's, uh, a photo of your own face.
translation.zh: ‎这张照片上是你的脸

translation.en: Yeah, makes me really happy. I think I look handsome in it.
translation.zh: ‎我看着它就开心 照片上的我很帅气

translation.en: That's what mirrors are for.
translation.zh: ‎镜子也有这种功能

translation.en: Come on, you get to have your things everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你的东西摆得到处都是

translation.en: Well, my things are cute and don't have my face on them.
translation.zh:
‎我的东西很漂亮
‎而且上面没有我的脸

translation.en: Uh-oh. What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: ‎我们怎么办？

translation.en: We're moving in together and you're already sick of my face.
translation.zh:
‎我们搬到一起住
‎你已经厌倦了我的脸

translation.en: [nervous chuckle] Yeah, if this doesn't work out, you'll have to move back out.
translation.zh: ‎对 如果事情进展不顺 你必须搬走

translation.en: Yep. And if we make any mistakes at all,
translation.zh: ‎对 如果我们犯错

translation.en: we'll probably break up and never see each other again.
translation.zh: ‎我们可能会分手 老死不相往来

translation.en: And all our mutual friends will hate you,
translation.zh: ‎我们共同的朋友会讨厌你

translation.en: and no one else will ever love or understand you--
translation.zh: ‎没人会再爱你或理解你…

translation.en: -[thumps] -[Speckle] Ow! Box!
translation.zh: ‎没人会再爱你或理解你… ‎箱子

translation.en: ♪ Got some random crap for my place ♪
translation.zh: ‎随便捡了些垃圾装饰我的窝

translation.en: ♪ Putting freaky things in the space ♪
translation.zh: ‎在这个地方放点烂东西

translation.en: ♪ Gotta get a lamp for this base ♪
translation.zh: ‎放盏台灯多快活

translation.en: ♪ Accidentally break a vase with my face ♪
translation.zh: ‎不小心用我的脸打碎花瓶

translation.en: ♪ Doesn't matter what I do 'Cause I live alone ♪
translation.zh: ‎我怎么做都没人说 一个人住真洒脱

translation.en: Ugh. I'm so bored.
translation.zh: ‎我好无聊！

translation.en: Nobody's here to listen to my great songs
translation.zh: ‎没人在这里听我的好听的歌

translation.en: and supply me with constant positive reinfo-fo!
translation.zh: ‎没人不断给我肯定的支持

translation.en: Hey, upstairs neighbor! Dapper Dog!
translation.zh: ‎楼上的邻居 衣冠楚楚狗

translation.en: Wanna hear a totally improvised banger?
translation.zh: ‎想听一首即兴创作的劲爆歌曲吗？

translation.en: Mayhaps, if you first indulge me my tale of woe.
translation.zh: ‎也许 如果你先聆听我悲哀的故事

translation.en: Oh, woe, my sweetest Henry!
translation.zh: ‎呜呼哀哉 我最亲爱的亨利

translation.en: Hard nope.
translation.zh: ‎休想

translation.en: Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎（抱歉 关闭）

translation.en: I know! I'll go visit Bertie.
translation.zh: ‎我想通了 我要去看柏蒂

translation.en: Let's see, I'll put on my good walking shoes.
translation.zh: ‎我想想 我要穿上好的休闲鞋

translation.en: Better bring an umbrella. Maybe I'll listen to a podcast on the way.
translation.zh: ‎最好带把伞 也许路上听段播客

translation.en: All right, all ready.
translation.zh: ‎好的 准备出发

translation.en: [radio host] Welcome to Breakfast Talk. I'm your host, Billy Eggs.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎收听《早餐聊天》
‎我是主持人比利蛋

translation.en: Today's episode is brought to you by OvalSpace.
translation.zh: ‎今天的节目由椭圆空间友情赞助

translation.en: Make any idea beautiful online with over 30 identical templates.
translation.zh:
‎用30多个完全一样的模板
‎创造美丽的在线网站

translation.en: OvalSpace.
translation.zh: ‎椭圆空间

translation.en: Today's a great episode. We talked...
translation.zh: ‎今天的节目很精彩 我们谈论了…

translation.en: Oh, my God, you live so far away from me now.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 你住的地方离我家好远

translation.en: [sighs] I'm so exhausted.
translation.zh: ‎我累死了

translation.en: [chuckles] You're so lazy.
translation.zh: ‎你太懒了

translation.en: Ooh! Why don't you let me install a fireman's pole in the ceiling
translation.zh:
‎不如你让我在天花板上
‎装一个消防员的滑杆？

translation.en: so I can slide down anytime?
translation.zh: ‎这样我可以随时滑下来

translation.en: -I'm pretty sure the landlord wouldn't-- -Hey, Speckle's an architect.
translation.zh:
‎-我相信房东不会…
‎-斯贝克是建筑师

translation.en: I bet he'd love to get a big ol' pole in here!
translation.zh:
‎我相信他会很喜欢
‎在这里装一个大杆子

translation.en: -Where's he at? -He's unpacking his toiletries.
translation.zh:
‎-他在哪儿？
‎-他在整理他的洗漱用品

translation.en: [Speckle] Hmm...
translation.zh: ‎（鸟嘴面膜）

translation.en: Hmm, feather straightener.
translation.zh: ‎羽毛拉直器…

translation.en: Feather curler? Okay.
translation.zh: ‎卷羽毛器？好的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好了

translation.en: [screams] No!
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: -[objects clattering] -[Speckle] I'm okay!
translation.zh: ‎不 ‎我没事

translation.en: -Mmm! Great muffins, neighbor. -[chuckles] Thanks, neighbor.
translation.zh:
‎-松饼真好吃 邻居
‎-谢谢你 邻居

translation.en: Oh, hey! Now we can do all kinds of neighbor stuff.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们可以做邻居们会一起做的事

translation.en: Like, I can collect your mail
translation.zh: ‎比如说我可以在你出门时

translation.en: and water your cactus when you're out of town.
translation.zh: ‎收你的邮件 给你的仙人掌浇水

translation.en: Oh, no. My cactus passed away.
translation.zh: ‎不 我的仙人掌死了

translation.en: What happened? Did you overwater?
translation.zh: ‎出什么事了？你浇水浇多了？

translation.en: Pricktina, baby girl, just tell me what you need.
translation.zh: ‎刺蒂娜 小宝贝 告诉我你需要什么

translation.en: You thirsty?
translation.zh: ‎你渴了吗？

translation.en: Is this helping?
translation.zh: ‎这样有帮助吗？

translation.en: Child, you overwatered.
translation.zh: ‎孩子 你浇水浇多了

translation.en: Can a mother overlove her daughter?
translation.zh: ‎母亲溺爱她的女儿不好吗？

translation.en: -Yes, she can, and I'm the proof. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎不好 我就是证明

translation.en: Anyways, what other neighbor stuff can we do?
translation.zh:
‎总之 还有什么其他邻居间的事
‎我们可以做呢？

translation.en: Ooh! I can borrow a cup of sugar.
translation.zh: ‎（喂宠物 偷报纸） ‎我可以借一杯糖

translation.en: Neighbors are constantly borrowing cups of sugar.
translation.zh: ‎邻居间总是借一杯糖

translation.en: We aren't officially neighbors until I get that C-O-S.
translation.zh:
‎在我拿到一杯糖后
‎我们就正式成为邻居了

translation.en: -♪ Cup-o'-sug' ♪ -[chuckles] Okay, okay!
translation.zh: ‎一杯糖 ‎好的…

translation.en: ♪ Bertie-ertie-ertie Getting sugar for her nae ♪
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂小柏蒂 给邻居拿糖糖

translation.en: ♪ Sweet sugar being got By the hottie, Bertie-bae ♪
translation.zh: ‎拿糖糖的是火辣的小柏蒂

translation.en: I love when you make up theme songs for me.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢你为我创作主题歌曲

translation.en: Huh. Speckle's sugar.
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克的糖

translation.en: -Hmm. Here you go, Tuca. -Cute! Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎给你 图卡 ‎太好了 谢谢 回头见 邻居

translation.en: -Well, see you later, neighbor. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎太好了 谢谢 回头见 邻居

translation.en: Wait, do you wanna grab your last box of stuff on your way out?
translation.zh:
‎慢着 你走的时候
‎想拿走你的最后一箱东西吗？

translation.en: I can't. Hands are full.
translation.zh: ‎没办法 手上有东西

translation.en: Okay, well, it's just kinda taking up some space here, so--
translation.zh: ‎好吧 只是有点占地方 所以…

translation.en: Sheesh! Relax about the box.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 别纠结箱子了

translation.en: I will take care of it eventually.
translation.zh: ‎我最终会拿走的

translation.en: Hmm...
translation.zh: ‎（书呆子海鸥壮男 腹肌和算盘）

translation.en: Oh, that is really specific.
translation.zh: ‎这也太具体了

translation.en: -[Speckle] Hey, Bertie? -Ah! Not my porn! I hate hunks!
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂 ‎这不是我的 我讨厌壮男

translation.en: Did you see my sugar bowl? I-- I put it here like an hour ago?
translation.zh:
‎你看到我的糖碗了吗？
‎我一小时前放在这里的？

translation.en: Oh, actually, I lent it to Tuca.
translation.zh: ‎我借给图卡了

translation.en: -What? You gave her my gamby's sugar? -Gamby?
translation.zh:
‎-什么？你把我祖母的糖给她了？
‎-祖母？

translation.en: My Grandmother Robin. That was her sugar bowl.
translation.zh: ‎我的罗宾祖母 那是她的糖碗

translation.en: [Speckle] It's been in our family for generations.
translation.zh: ‎在我家已经传了很多代了

translation.en: [Bertie] Oh, no.
translation.zh: ‎不是吧

translation.en: And when she passed away, we put her ashes in there.
translation.zh: ‎她去世后 我们把她的骨灰放在里面

translation.en: Why, why, why?
translation.zh: ‎为什么…

translation.en: Well, it's a Robin family tradition.
translation.zh: ‎这是罗宾家的传统

translation.en: [Speckle] Gamby Robin was very sweet, so we mixed her with sugar.
translation.zh:
‎罗宾祖母为人亲切
‎我们把她和糖混在一起

translation.en: My gumbo was mixed with sage because he was wise.
translation.zh:
‎我的祖父和鼠尾草混在一起
‎因为他很聪明

translation.en: My aunt was mixed with paprika, if you know what I mean.
translation.zh:
‎我的姑母和辣椒粉混在一起
‎你知道我的意思吧

translation.en: I don't know what any of this means.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道这是什么意思

translation.en: It means that sugar bowl was important to me.
translation.zh: ‎意思是那个糖碗对我来说很重要

translation.en: Why would you give it to Tuca?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么给图卡？

translation.en: She asked!
translation.zh: ‎她问我要了

translation.en: I felt guilty for making her move out and I wanted her to be happy.
translation.zh: ‎让她搬出去我很内疚 我希望她开心

translation.en: [groans] So why didn't you give her your sugar?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不把自己的糖给她？

translation.en: Well, it was just really expensive.
translation.zh: ‎我的糖真的很贵

translation.en: You asked me to move in.
translation.zh: ‎你要我搬进来的

translation.en: Now I can't hang up my pictures, there's no room for my stuff,
translation.zh:
‎我不能挂自己的照片
‎没有地方放我的东西

translation.en: and you gave my grandmother away.
translation.zh: ‎你把我的祖母也送人了

translation.en: I... I just need to feel like I live here, too, Bertie.
translation.zh: ‎我需要真正住在这里的感觉 柏蒂

translation.en: Oh, my God, you're right! I've been so thoughtless.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 你说得对 我太没心没肺了

translation.en: I'm gonna fix this, Speckle. Freeze right there.
translation.zh: ‎我会解决的 斯贝克 千万别动

translation.en: [sighs] Well, I'm not one to pass up a good freeze.
translation.zh: ‎我无法拒绝一个高质量的木头人游戏

translation.en: Don't break up with me!
translation.zh: ‎别和我分手

translation.en: [Bertie] Tuca?
translation.zh: ‎图卡

translation.en: Hey, I need that sugar bowl back.
translation.zh: ‎我要把糖碗拿回来

translation.en: It was Speckle's and it's precious, and... Oh, God, Tuca. I really fudged things up.
translation.zh: ‎那是斯贝克的 非常珍贵 ‎天啊 图卡 我真的搞砸了

translation.en: He's gently disappointed in me!
translation.zh: ‎他温柔地对我失望了

translation.en: Oh, no, that's the worst kind of disappointed
translation.zh: ‎不 这是世上最糟糕的失望

translation.en: because you can't get defensive, so you really internalize the guilt.
translation.zh:
‎因为你无法还击
‎所以你只能吞下内疚

translation.en: I know!
translation.zh: ‎我知道

translation.en: You know, this never would've happened if we'd just stayed roommates.
translation.zh:
‎你知道的 如果我们还是室友
‎这一切就不会发生

translation.en: -Tuca, the sugar bowl? Give it! -I gave it to a neighbor.
translation.zh:
‎-图卡 快把糖碗给我
‎-我给邻居了

translation.en: -What? Why? -Because that's what neighbors do.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？为什么？
‎-因为这是邻居间应该做的

translation.en: -[groans] -Plus, it tasted like ashes. Yuck!
translation.zh:
‎-什么？为什么？
‎-因为这是邻居间应该做的 ‎而且 糖的味道像灰

translation.en: No! Who'd you give it to?
translation.zh: ‎不 你给谁了？

translation.en: Oh, I just lent it to the plant lady who lives across from me.
translation.zh: ‎我借给了住在我对面的植物女士

translation.en: Oh, my God, she is so cool. I can't believe you talked to her.
translation.zh:
‎我的天 她太酷了
‎我不敢相信你和她说话了

translation.en: Yeah, you know, I'm just trying to get into the fifth-floor vibe.
translation.zh: ‎我在尝试融入五楼的氛围

translation.en: You fourth-floorers wouldn't get it.
translation.zh: ‎你们四楼的不会明白

translation.en: Yo, Draca, it's me again, your fave new naby.
translation.zh: ‎德瑞卡 又是我 你最爱的新邻居

translation.en: Hi. Uh, I'm Bertie. I've seen you around.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我是柏蒂 我见过你

translation.en: Your style is so radical. Um--
translation.zh: ‎你的风格很前卫…

translation.en: -Hey, be cool. -I can't. I'm starved for her approval!
translation.zh:
‎-正常一点
‎-我没办法 我极度需要她的认可

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: Remember when I handed you some sugar and you rustled your leaves mysteriously?
translation.zh:
‎还记得我给你了一些糖
‎你神秘地弄响了你的叶子吗？

translation.en: That was a nice little moment we had, huh?
translation.zh: ‎那是我们拥有的美好时光 对吗？

translation.en: So, no big deal, but turns out we need that sug' back.
translation.zh: ‎没什么大事 但我们需要拿回糖

translation.en: Do you still have it?
translation.zh: ‎还在你这里吗？

translation.en: Ooh! We get to see her house!
translation.zh: ‎我们可以看到她的房间

translation.en: -So... -Uh, cool place you got here, Draca.
translation.zh:
‎-那么…
‎-你家真酷 德瑞卡

translation.en: -Really unique. -Tropical.
translation.zh:
‎-非常特别
‎-有热带风情

translation.en: Okay, I'll say it. You have too many turtles.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我说了 你家的乌龟太多了

translation.en: [whispers] Hey, do you think the sugar is on one of these guys?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得糖在乌龟背上吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let's check these turts.
translation.zh: ‎我们去看看

translation.en: Mouthwash. Fertilizer.
translation.zh: ‎漱口水？肥料

translation.en: Fashion magazine, dirty dishes. A tiny house?
translation.zh:
‎-时尚杂志 脏盘子
‎-微型房子？

translation.en: A love letter.
translation.zh: ‎一封情书

translation.en: It's to another turtle!
translation.zh: ‎给另一只乌龟的

translation.en: [laughs] This is great.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了

translation.en: This is hopeless, Tuca. I don't see the sugar anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎没希望了 图卡 我根本没看到糖

translation.en: Oh, yeah. The sugar. Right.
translation.zh: ‎对 糖 没错

translation.en: [gasps] Bertie, the window's open! Look!
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂 窗户开了 看

translation.en: -Turt alert! -To the streets!
translation.zh:
‎-乌龟警报
‎-去街上

translation.en: Um, thank you for having us over. Maybe we can hang out someti-- [yelps]
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你请我们进来
‎也许我们可以改天一起…

translation.en: Bye!
translation.zh: ‎再见！

translation.en: Speckle, I almost have the sugar back.
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克 我快拿到糖了

translation.en: Just hold on a few more minutes. Don't dump me!
translation.zh: ‎再坚持几分钟 不要甩我

translation.en: [muffled] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: This might be my best freeze yet.
translation.zh: ‎这次可能会是我保持不动的最佳纪录

translation.en: -Hey, ladies. -Not now, Bruce.
translation.zh:
‎-女士们 你们好哇
‎-不是时候 布鲁斯

translation.en: Can't chat, Bruce. We're trying to chase down some sugar.
translation.zh: ‎没时间聊天 布鲁斯 我们在找糖

translation.en: -Why don't you give me some sugar? -Ugh. Bruce, give it up.
translation.zh: ‎不如你给我一些甜头？ ‎布鲁斯 省省吧

translation.en: I am never gonna sleep with you. Again.
translation.zh: ‎我再也不会跟你上床了

translation.en: That was just a one-time thing I did twice.
translation.zh: ‎那只是我做了两次的一夜情

translation.en: -What? You slept with Bruce? -He's the main reason I'm sober now.
translation.zh: ‎什么？你和布鲁斯上床了？ ‎他是我戒瘾的主要原因

translation.en: When you relapse, I'll be waiting.
translation.zh: ‎等你再犯瘾时 我会等着你

translation.en: -Ugh. -Ooh, sick.
translation.zh: ‎变态

translation.en: -Which way did it go? -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎它去了哪边？

translation.en: -Oh, I got this. -Whoa.
translation.zh: ‎我知道了

translation.en: Bertie, it's that dirty turtie!
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂 是那只脏脏的乌龟

translation.en: -Hey there, little buddy. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你好 小家伙

translation.en: Wait! That's our sugar!
translation.zh: ‎等等 那是我们的糖

translation.en: Life lesson: nothing belongs to anyone!
translation.zh:
‎吃一堑长一智
‎你我都是赤条来世空手还

translation.en: Damn it. That's a fun thing to say, but tough to hear.
translation.zh: ‎见鬼 这话说出来爽快 听起来难受

translation.en: Come on, Tuca. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎快 图卡 快去追

translation.en: -[hisses] -♪ Dirt-dirt-dirt-dirt-dirt-dirty turtie ♪
[distorted] ♪ Go! ♪
translation.zh: ‎（慢走游行 步履缓慢的散步）

translation.en: -♪ That dirt-dirt-dirt-dirty turtie ♪ -Hey!
translation.zh: ‎（够慢 放轻松） ‎嘿

translation.en: ♪ Dirt-dirt-dirt-dirty turtie ♪
translation.zh: ‎（扑蝶网 捞鱼网）

translation.en: ♪ That dirt-dirt-dirt-dirty turtie ♪
translation.zh: ‎（网球网 响板 恶霸网）

translation.en: Whoa. Pastry Pete's Patisserie.
translation.zh: ‎糕点皮特的糕点铺

translation.en: Pastry Pete is so brilliant.
translation.zh: ‎糕点皮特太厉害了

translation.en: Did you know he won a Tasty Num Nums Award last year
translation.zh:
‎你知道他赢得了
‎去年的美味无敌大奖吗？

translation.en: for combining crullers and Bundt cakes?
translation.zh: ‎他把炸甜糕和圆海绵蛋糕结合在一起

translation.en: -They're called "crunts"! -Oh, you got a crush on him.
translation.zh:
‎-大家称之为“甜绵糕”
‎-你喜欢他

translation.en: -Speckle better watch out. -I do not! Shut up!
translation.zh:
‎-斯贝克得小心了
‎-我没有 闭嘴

translation.en: I'm telling you, you gotta try those sweet, crusty crunts.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说
‎你一定得尝尝美味的甜绵糕

translation.en: -Ew! -Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: ‎快 我们走

translation.en: Give us back our sugar, you half-wet, half-dry, full-slime booger.
translation.zh:
‎把糖还给我们
‎你这个半湿半干全是粘液的鼻屎

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.zh: ‎出什么事了？

translation.en: [gasps] Pastry Pete!
translation.zh: ‎糕点皮特

translation.en: ♪ Woo! ♪
translation.zh: ‎（专业泡芙师傅） ‎（挑剔的糕点店老板 企鹅）

translation.en: Why are you yelling at my nephew?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么吼我的侄子？

translation.en: That's our sugar. That brat stole it from us.
translation.zh: ‎那是我们的糖 这个小混蛋偷走了

translation.en: My nephew is a perfect angel.
translation.zh: ‎我侄子是完美的天使

translation.en: He says he found this on a public street turtle.
translation.zh:
‎他说这是他
‎在公共街道上的乌龟身上找到的

translation.en: That's right, Unky Petey.
translation.zh: ‎没错 皮特叔叔

translation.en: This child is a spoiled pile of soft-serve assface.
translation.zh: ‎这孩子就是一个被宠坏的小屁孩

translation.en: Unky!
translation.zh: ‎叔叔

translation.en: And stay out of my bakery.
translation.zh: ‎滚出我的糕点店

translation.en: Okay, but I might come back in to buy an éclair!
translation.zh: ‎好 但我有可能回来买泡芙条

translation.en: Oh, Speckle is gonna hate me.
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克会恨死我的

translation.en: The first seed of resentment has been planted.
translation.zh: ‎第一粒怨恨的种子已经种下了

translation.en: This is my first time living with a boyfriend,
translation.zh: ‎这是我第一次和男友同居

translation.en: and I already totally fricked it up.
translation.zh: ‎我已经完全搞砸了

translation.en: Hey, don't worry.
translation.zh: ‎别担心

translation.en: Worst-case scenario, you guys break up, and then I can move back in.
translation.zh:
‎最差的情况就是你们分手
‎我就可以搬回来了

translation.en: I don't want that! I want to live with my boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎我不想这样 我想和我男友一起住

translation.en: So, this is really permanent?
translation.zh: ‎所以情况不会改变了？

translation.en: Well, I hope so.
translation.zh: ‎我希望是的

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me? -This isn't about you!
translation.zh: ‎你为什么这样对我？ ‎重点不是你

translation.en: Everything was great when we lived together.
translation.zh: ‎我们住在一起时 一切都好好的

translation.en: But now it's all, "Tuca, get your box of stuff out of the way!"
translation.zh:
‎但现在成了
‎“图卡 把你的箱子拿走”

translation.en: "Tuca, get my sugar turt!"
translation.zh: ‎“图卡 去找回我的糖乌龟”

translation.en: "Tuca, erase yourself from the apartment we shared for six years
translation.zh:
‎“图卡 把你自己
‎从我们共享六年的公寓擦掉

translation.en: so I don't have to be reminded of you
translation.zh: ‎这样我和我的男友

translation.en: while I'm living my perfect life with my boyfriend!"
translation.zh: ‎过完美生活时 不必想起你”

translation.en: I never said--
translation.zh: ‎我从没说过…

translation.en: [Tuca] Now you're settling down, doing this normie life-plan bullshit,
translation.zh:
‎现在你安定下来
‎完成正常人生规划那一套

translation.en: and you're gonna get married, and have babies, and host dinner parties
translation.zh: ‎你会结婚 生孩子 举办晚宴

translation.en: where you serve things like crostini and bruschetta.
translation.zh: ‎你会给大家吃蔻斯提尼 意式蒜香片

translation.en: Well, you're not fooling me.
translation.zh: ‎你骗不了我

translation.en: -Those are just toast! -What?
translation.zh:
‎-这些只是烤面包片
‎-什么？

translation.en: And you never wanna have fun adventures anymore.
translation.zh: ‎你再也不想经历有趣的冒险

translation.en: You'd rather stay at home and be boring.
translation.zh: ‎你宁愿宅在家闷死

translation.en: I don't want to be boring.
translation.zh: ‎我不想闷死

translation.en: I want to know that everything's going to be okay so I can relax! Ugh!
translation.zh:
‎我希望知道所有事都会顺利
‎我就可以放轻松

translation.en: Right now, there's nothing I'd rather do than go home, putter around, watch TV,
translation.zh:
‎现在我最想做的就是回家
‎无所事事 看电视

translation.en: bake a big batch of croissants--
translation.zh: ‎烤一大批牛角面包…

translation.en: Huh. Croissants.
translation.zh: ‎牛角面包

translation.en: Uh-oh. You're getting that look you get whenever you have a dumb--
translation.zh: ‎牛角面包 ‎你脸上的表情是你每次有蠢主意时…

translation.en: -I have an amazing idea! Follow me! -No!
translation.zh:
‎我有个非常好的主意 ‎-跟我来
‎-不

translation.en: [grunts] Hey, Pastry Puff!
translation.zh: ‎糕点泡芙

translation.en: Ugh.
translation.zh: ‎（生日呸）

translation.en: Bertie here would like to challenge you to a croissant bake-off.
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂要和你来场牛角面包大对决

translation.en: -Huh? -No, no, no! What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎不…你在做什么？

translation.en: He's a professional. I'm not good enough.
translation.zh: ‎他是专业的 我不行

translation.en: Bertie is the best chef in the whole world and she can kick your ass.
translation.zh:
‎柏蒂是全世界最棒的大厨
‎她可以击败你

translation.en: And we're having a really big fight right now, but she's my best friend!
translation.zh: ‎我们正在吵架 但她是我最好的朋友

translation.en: I don't really see how that's relevant.
translation.zh: ‎我完全不明白这有什么关联

translation.en: If Bertie's croissants are better than yours,
translation.zh: ‎如果柏蒂的牛角面包比你的好吃

translation.en: you gotta give us back our sugar.
translation.zh: ‎你就得把糖还给我们

translation.en: This is a bad idea, Tuca!
translation.zh: ‎这是个坏主意 图卡

translation.en: Well, by the chef's code, I cannot turn down a cooking challenge.
translation.zh: ‎根据大厨准则 我不能拒绝厨艺挑战 ‎（大厨准则 接受所有厨艺挑战）

translation.en: So, we shall have a croissant tournament.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们来举行一场牛角面包比赛

translation.en: If you win, you'll get that sugar bowl.
translation.zh: ‎如果你赢了 就能拿走糖碗

translation.en: And if I win, you need to babysit my nephew.
translation.zh: ‎如果我赢了 你得给我的侄子做保姆

translation.en: [laughs maniacally] Die, turtle!
translation.zh: ‎去死 乌龟

translation.en: -But my CPR license is expired! -We agree to your terms.
translation.zh:
‎-但我的心肺复苏执照过期了
‎-我们同意你的条件

translation.en: -[growls] -Hmm...
translation.zh: ‎（面粉）

translation.en: This, uh... It just needs to chill for a bit.
translation.zh: ‎这个…需要冷藏一下

translation.en: Because that's a vital step in baking croissants, of course.
translation.zh:
‎那是当然
‎因为这是做牛角面包的关键步骤

translation.en: ♪ Bertie-ertie-ertie Gotta get that dough rolled ♪
translation.zh: ‎柏蒂小柏蒂 快揉面团

translation.en: ♪ Crush it, little Bertie Win back that ash bowl ♪
translation.zh: ‎好好表现 赢回骨灰碗

translation.en: Ugh. Couldn't you have picked something simpler for this competition?
translation.zh:
‎你就不能为比赛
‎选个简单一点的东西吗？

translation.en: You're the one who said croissants!
translation.zh: ‎是你说了“牛角面包”

translation.en: -[grunts] -Hey. So, um, I'm sorry about what I said.
translation.zh: ‎那个…抱歉我说了那些话

translation.en: I'm really excited for you and Speckle.
translation.zh: ‎我对你和斯贝克的事很期待

translation.en: And you're not boring. You're a magnificent little weirdo.
translation.zh:
‎你这人并不闷
‎你是个了不起的小怪胎

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？尽管情况改变了 图卡

translation.en: You know, even though things are changing, Tuca, you're still my best friend.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？尽管情况改变了 图卡 ‎你依然是我最好的朋友

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: ‎我需要你

translation.en: Aw. And you always let me eat your snacks.
translation.zh: ‎你总是让我吃你做的点心

translation.en: -[laughs] -What's wrong?
translation.zh: ‎你总是让我吃你做的点心 ‎怎么了？

translation.en: Well, I'm still mad.
translation.zh: ‎我还在生气

translation.en: Even though we just made up, I still have an upset feeling.
translation.zh:
‎尽管我们刚刚和好了
‎但我依然有不高兴的情绪

translation.en: That's okay, buddy. Here, wanna punch some dough?
translation.zh: ‎没事 伙计 来 想揍面团吗？

translation.en: There you go! Better?
translation.zh: ‎对了 好些了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎是 谢谢

translation.en: Whoa, too much. Take it easy.
translation.zh: ‎太过了 慢点

translation.en: -[laughs] -Well, she's out of control.
translation.zh: ‎太过了 慢点 ‎她失控了

translation.en: Somebody stop this woman. She's on a rampage! -[chuckles] -[timer dings]
translation.zh: ‎来人阻止这个女人 她暴跳如雷

translation.en: Ooh! They're ready!
translation.zh: ‎面包好了

translation.en: Mmm. Let's see. Very croissant-y.
translation.zh: ‎（评委） ‎来看看 很有牛角面包的味道

translation.en: Wait, why are you the one judging this competition?
translation.zh: ‎慢着 为什么是你来做评委？

translation.en: Wow, this one is even croissantier.
translation.zh: ‎这个更有牛角面包的味道

translation.en: Dare I say, croissantiest and best.
translation.zh:
‎我敢说 最有牛角面包的味道
‎也是最佳的

translation.en: -[harmonica playing] -[applause]
translation.zh: ‎（最佳）

translation.en: This is absurd!
translation.zh: ‎太荒谬了

translation.en: Hmm. Mm. Mm.
translation.zh: ‎（加油站 旅馆早餐） ‎（一般 不错）

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.zh: ‎（天堂）

translation.en: -What bakery do you work at? -Oh, I don't work at a bakery.
translation.zh:
‎-你在哪家面包店工作？
‎-我没有在面包店工作

translation.en: -A restaurant, then? -No, I work at a magazine.
translation.zh:
‎-那就是餐厅了？
‎-不 我在杂志社工作

translation.en: Ah, a gourmet food magazine! Which one?
translation.zh: ‎美食杂志 哪一本？

translation.en: Actually, it's just a magazine publisher.
translation.zh: ‎其实只是一家杂志出版商

translation.en: I do mostly data processing.
translation.zh: ‎我主要负责资料处理

translation.en: Yeah, bitch, you got beat by a woman off the street!
translation.zh: ‎贱人 你被一个外行女生打败了

translation.en: Deal with it!
translation.zh: ‎认输吧

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: ‎我知道了

translation.en: Here's my card.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的名片

translation.en: Call me if you ever want to quit your desk job
translation.zh:
‎如果你想辞去办公室工作
‎来我这里上班

translation.en: and come work for me.
translation.zh: ‎就给我电话

translation.en: Your technique needs to be tamed, but I taste your passion.
translation.zh:
‎你的技艺需要打磨
‎但我尝到了你的热情

translation.en: -You're a, uh, croissant savant. -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎你是牛角面包专家

translation.en: Make sure not to eat that card.
translation.zh: ‎不要把名片吃了

translation.en: It's made of a very thin, toothsome wafer with sugar ink.
translation.zh:
‎它是由非常薄而且美味的威化
‎以及糖墨水制成的

translation.en: It took me ten years to learn how to make it.
translation.zh: ‎我花了十年才学会怎么做

translation.en: -Dude, don't let me eat that card, m'kay? -Thank you?
translation.zh: ‎伙计 别让我吃这张名片 好吗？ ‎谢谢你？

translation.en: And now, you can take back your sugar.
translation.zh: ‎现在 你可以拿回你的糖

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.zh: ‎惊喜

translation.en: [muffled] My gamby is a cake now?
translation.zh: ‎我的祖母现在是蛋糕了？

translation.en: Whoops. Unfreeze!
translation.zh: ‎取消木头人

translation.en: Ooh, pins and needles! Don't touch me. Don't touch me right now.
translation.zh: ‎手脚发麻 别碰我 现在别碰我

translation.en: Pins and needles! My gamby is a cake now?
translation.zh: ‎手脚发麻 我的祖母现在是蛋糕？

translation.en: Baked by the Tasty Num Nums award-winning inventor of the crunt.
translation.zh:
‎由美味无敌大奖获得者
‎及甜绵糕发明者制作而成

translation.en: -[chuckles] -We brought croissants, too.
translation.zh: ‎我们还带回了牛角面包

translation.en: Made out of regular ingredients, not dead people.
translation.zh: ‎由普通原料制成 而非死人

translation.en: Aw, jeez.
translation.zh: ‎天啊

translation.en: Oh, Speckle, is that you?
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克 是你吗？

translation.en: Gamby?
translation.zh: ‎祖母？

translation.en: Oh, Speckle, my boy! My dearest grand-peep.
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克 我的孩子 我最亲爱的孙子

translation.en: Oh, my God, I can't believe it's you!
translation.zh: ‎我的天 真不敢相信是你

translation.en: I'm so glad I was baked into a cake
translation.zh: ‎我真庆幸自己被做成了蛋糕

translation.en: so I could say a proper goodbye and tell you I'm proud of you.
translation.zh:
‎这样我可以和你好好地道别
‎并告诉你我为你骄傲

translation.en: Now, Speckle, please eat me.
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克 现在请吃掉我

translation.en: Gobble me up, sweet child!
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-快把我吃了 好孩子

translation.en: I'm trapped between the worlds of the living and the dead,
translation.zh: ‎我被困在了生与死之间的世界

translation.en: and I need you to eat me so my soul can finally rest!
translation.zh:
‎我需要你把我吃掉
‎这样我的灵魂才能安息

translation.en: I... I can't!
translation.zh: ‎我做不到

translation.en: Be a good boy and eat your gamby!
translation.zh: ‎做个好孩子 把你的祖母吃掉

translation.en: Yeah! Eat the ghost cake! Eat the ghost cake!
translation.zh: ‎对 吃掉鬼蛋糕…

translation.en: I guess I could try a little if-- if that's what you want, Gamby.
translation.zh:
‎如果你坚持这样
‎我想我可以尝试一下 祖母

translation.en: -Mm... -So? How do you like being an architect, baby boy?
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢做建筑师吗？小男孩

translation.en: It's rewarding work. I'm pretty good at it.
translation.zh: ‎这是很有收获的工作 我很擅长

translation.en: More bureaucracy than I anticipated, though.
translation.zh: ‎不过官僚主义比我想象中厉害

translation.en: You were always a bright one.
translation.zh: ‎你一直是个聪明的小家伙

translation.en: Oh, Gamby, you're actually really delicious.
translation.zh: ‎祖母 你真的很好吃

translation.en: This is the most disgusting and disturbing thing I've ever--
translation.zh:
‎这是我见过的最恶心
‎最令人不安的事

translation.en: -Can I have some? -Tuca!
translation.zh:
‎-我能吃点吗？
‎-图卡

translation.en: [Gamby] Speckle, sliding down your throat tickles!
translation.zh: ‎斯贝克 滑下你喉头感觉很痒

translation.en: [sighs] Settle down, Gamby.
translation.zh: ‎冷静 祖母

translation.en: [Gamby] Now, would you drink some gin and club soda
translation.zh: ‎现在你能喝点金酒加苏打水吗？

translation.en: so I can have a party down here?
translation.zh: ‎这样我能在这里开个派对

translation.en: Gamby, be quiet!
translation.zh: ‎祖母 安静

translation.en: Wow, so this all worked out pretty great, huh?
translation.zh: ‎看来结果一切顺利嘛

translation.en: Oh, God, Speckle. I'm sorry I gave your sugar away.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 斯贝克
‎很抱歉我把你的糖给了别人

translation.en: If you don't wanna live with me anymore, I understand.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不想和我住在一起 我能理解

translation.en: Don't want to live with you? Of course I want to live with you.
translation.zh: ‎不想和你住在一起？我当然想了

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: Yeah! You know when you're coming home late at night?
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-是的 ‎你知道很晚回家的感觉吗？

translation.en: [Bertie] Yeah?
translation.zh: ‎怎样？

translation.en: [Speckle] And everything inside looks so warm and yellow,
translation.zh: ‎里面的一切是那么温暖 那么黄

translation.en: and everything outside is so blue?
translation.zh: ‎外面的一切都是冷幽幽的蓝色

translation.en: I love thinking about how, from now on,
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢想到从现在开始

translation.en: this little piece of yellow is for us, our warm home together.
translation.zh:
‎这块小小的黄色是属于我们的
‎是我们共同的温暖的家

translation.en: That's pretty gooey, huh?
translation.zh: ‎相当感伤吧？

translation.en: Aw, you guys.
translation.zh: ‎你们真是的

translation.en: Okay, I'll bounce so you can get all mushy.
translation.zh: ‎我走了 你们继续多愁善感

translation.en: I guess I'll finally get my box of stuff out of your way.
translation.zh: ‎我想我终于要搬走最后一箱东西了

translation.en: -Then I'll be all done moving out. -Great idea!
translation.zh:
‎-那样我就完全搬出去了
‎-好主意

translation.en: You know, Tuca, if you wanna leave your box here, you can.
translation.zh:
‎图卡 如果你想
‎把箱子留在这里 也没问题

translation.en: -[gasps] Really? -Or you can just take it.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-或者你可以直接拿走

translation.en: -Right now. -We've got room.
translation.zh:
‎-现在拿走
‎-我们有地方

translation.en: Then you can just come over whenever you need anything in it.
translation.zh:
‎这样你需要箱子里的东西时
‎可以随时来拿

translation.en: -Yeah? -Sure!
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-当然

translation.en: Aw. That would be great.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了

translation.en: Let's see, it only has my toothbrush, my daily medication--
translation.zh:
‎来看看 里面只有我的牙刷
‎我日常的药物

translation.en: Oh, well, you don't have to leave every--
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你不必留下所有…

translation.en: All my underwear, my sex toys.
translation.zh: ‎我所有的内裤 我的性爱玩具

translation.en: Maybe just pick up the box and then, like, take it?
translation.zh: ‎要不抬起箱子直接拿走？

translation.en: This will be great. My EpiPen, smoke detector batteries,
translation.zh:
‎太棒了 我的过敏急救笔
‎烟雾报警器的电池

translation.en: bike pump, old porn, new porn, frying pan, screwdriver...
translation.zh:
‎单车打气筒 旧色情杂志
‎新色情杂志 平底锅 螺丝刀

translation.en: All right, gang, let's get this wingding bash-a-roo a-ragin'! -Agh! -Ooh! [giggles]
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 咱们来开派对吧
